title: btcb3g1nn3r
author: btcb3g1nn3r
content: hi there,Thanks to some recommendation I got from this forum, I am a member of MysteryWave telegram channel.The problem is that community is dead  I would like to create a telegram channel of EW traders that can share daily chart ideas and chat about EW as trading method.As option, we can make it more fun by comparing the ideas and see who's the most accurate day trader, to have some sort of ranking So, is there any EW trader willing to share his count via such telegram channel?

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Yeah, MysteryWave is a good telegram channel, as I remember, I was there before. It's just sad they are now not active anymore.Quote from: btcb3g1nn3r on May 19, 2022, 09:45:38 PM(....)So, is there any EW trader willing to share his count via such telegram channel?You can count me in for this. I also believe there are a lot of traders here especially using the Elliot Wave method. Just make sure there will be some moderator to the channel to avoid spam or scams. I think it's better to drop the channel and it is open for everyone who wants to join.

comments.author: btcb3g1nn3r
comments.body: I'm willing to send the channel name via private message since I want to select the users that are really willing to be active rather to have a ton of just curious people

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: btcb3g1nn3r on May 20, 2022, 04:50:59 AMI'm willing to send the channel name via private message since I want to select the users that are really willing to be active rather to have a ton of just curious people Well then, how are you going to identify people who will be active and are interested in discussing the Elliot Wave in Telegram?It's a good idea, but getting those members is not going to be easy. Most people want to learn from other people's ideas.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 22, 2022, 10:13:01 PMIt's a good idea, but getting those members is not going to be easy. Most people want to learn from other people's ideas.The possible problem would be this, as we know about the background of Telegram social media, there's a bunch of scammers or let's say, a house of scammers.  Though the concept is good I'm afraid it will end up in a pump and dump group which is the member will rely on other's opinion only and becomes the lazy one. Quote from: btcb3g1nn3r on May 20, 2022, 04:50:59 AMI'm willing to send the channel name via private message since I want to select the users that are really willing to be active rather to have a ton of just curious people Curiosity is always, especially for those people who have experienced scams.However, good luck with your plan and I think, you will have others to catch attention if you'll drop it here some proof about your group, and yes, it should be good if there's an admin in the group, it will become hot to the eye of scammers.

comments.author: Ararbermas
comments.body: Quote from: btcb3g1nn3r on May 19, 2022, 09:45:38 PMhi there,Thanks to some recommendation I got from this forum, I am a member of MysteryWave telegram channel.The problem is that community is dead  I would like to create a telegram channel of EW traders that can share daily chart ideas and chat about EW as trading method.As option, we can make it more fun by comparing the ideas and see who's the most accurate day trader, to have some sort of ranking So, is there any EW trader willing to share his count via such telegram channel? i am not familiar with that EW and what it stands for, but seems a good idea if the purpose of creating a group is for sharing an idea and technical analysis something like that.Btw i use to analyze and making ideas in the market when day trading but only crypto. So if this is for crypto trading then i am interested to join because it will be more fun IMO.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on May 20, 2022, 02:41:42 AMYeah, MysteryWave is a good telegram channel, as I remember, I was there before. It's just sad they are now not active anymore.Quote from: btcb3g1nn3r on May 19, 2022, 09:45:38 PM(....)So, is there any EW trader willing to share his count via such telegram channel?You can count me in for this. I also believe there are a lot of traders here especially using the Elliot Wave method. Just make sure there will be some moderator to the channel to avoid spam or scams. I think it's better to drop the channel and it is open for everyone who wants to join.If it's a legit process, most of everyone who trade will like to be in. But a process whereby is a strategies to scam, it will be some else. Before someone will join their channel we have to scrutinized them and find out if this is real what is obtainable, because respected user of this noble institution is in lines with them, is very obvious that many users and especially newbies will like to pertake with this ideas. So therefore we need to be conscious about it.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Your problem lies in the members, the quality of the discussions and who to encourage the discussion, Telegram makes things quick and easy, but the problem lies in how to entice members to participate with meaningful posts.Therefore, the best solution may take some time, which is to start participating actively here, get to know more members and over time you can ask them to join your channel and participate actively.In general, such channels need patience and good management and will grow quickly.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Ararbermas on May 24, 2022, 07:53:42 AMi am not familiar with that EW and what it stands for, but seems a good idea if the purpose of creating a group is for sharing an idea and technical analysis something like that.Btw i use to analyze and making ideas in the market when day trading but only crypto. So if this is for crypto trading then i am interested to join because it will be more fun IMO. I think that the already existing telegram groups are enough for everyone to find for themselves what they want. You just need to make the right choice among the existing channels. The creation of a new channel and community will take a lot of time and it is not a fact that it will be successful.

comments.author: btcb3g1nn3r
comments.body: For me it's enough to have 5-10 people from this forum sharing daily EW charts, I see some interested so waiting for some more then I'll create that channel.Till then I linger in MysteryWave and few others.

comments.author: bitcub
comments.created_time: May 30, 2022, 10:51:01 PMLast edit: May 31, 2022, 04:22:11 AM by bitcub
comments.body: I am a breakout trader with a Smart Money concept in mind. I would like to learn more about Eliot Wave. Actually, I have an account on the official website of EW, I just forgot to continue the freebie reading materials.Quote from: btcb3g1nn3r on May 19, 2022, 09:45:38 PMhi there,Thanks to some recommendation I got from this forum, I am a member of MysteryWave telegram channel.The problem is that community is dead  I would like to create a telegram channel of EW traders that can share daily chart ideas and chat about EW as trading method.As option, we can make it more fun by comparing the ideas and see who's the most accurate day trader, to have some sort of ranking So, is there any EW trader willing to share his count via such telegram channel?

comments.author: topman21
comments.body: If you want to get started you can start. Of course you have to have expert people here.Everyone here should be open so that everyone can get good service about trading from here.No such person will be here even if it is a scam. Don't let anyone get hurt by wrong ideas and wrong decisions.
